name: part_003
file: tmp_【#紫咲シオン生誕祭2021】いっぱいありがとう！！Birthday Live2021【ホロライブ⧸紫咲シオン】 [oLZxkEJAm8U]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_003.mov

scenes.description: Murasaki Shion and Houshou Marine perform the song 'Ojamajo'.
MC section where Shion and Marine interact, take photos in various poses, and Marine acts like an 'old lady'.
Murasaki Shion and Usada Pekora perform the song 'The Snow White Princess is'.

subtitles.original: さよならは また君に会うため
subtitles.english: Saying goodbye is so I can meet you again.

subtitles.original: おやすみは 明日の早起きのため
subtitles.english: Saying goodnight is so I can wake up early tomorrow.

subtitles.original: 君の日々を 少し邪魔したいんだ
subtitles.english: I want to bother your daily life just a little.

subtitles.original: これからも どうかよろしくね
subtitles.english: Please take good care of me from now on too.

subtitles.original: ねぇ 好きって言って
subtitles.english: Hey, say that you love me.

subtitles.original: 好きって言って
subtitles.english: Say that you love me.

subtitles.original: 他に何もいらないから
subtitles.english: Because I don't need anything else.

subtitles.original: ねぇ 好きって言って
subtitles.english: Hey, say that you love me.

subtitles.original: 忘れないように
subtitles.english: So I won't forget.

subtitles.original: 君以外いらないから
subtitles.english: Because I don't need anyone but you.

subtitles.original: ぱふぱふにゃーにゃー
subtitles.english: Paffu-paffu nyaa-nyaa

subtitles.original: ぱふぱふにゃーにゃー
subtitles.english: Paffu-paffu nyaa-nyaa

subtitles.original: ぱふぱふにゃーにゃー おーまいごー
subtitles.english: Paffu-paffu nyaa-nyaa, oh my god.

subtitles.original: ねぇ 好き
subtitles.english: Hey, I love you.

subtitles.original: 大好き
subtitles.english: I love you so much.

subtitles.original: 超好き
subtitles.english: I super love you.

subtitles.original: もう分かんないくらい好き
subtitles.english: I love you so much I don't even know anymore.

subtitles.original: あー好き ちょっとだけだけど
subtitles.english: Ah, I love you... even if it's just a little bit.

subtitles.original: この思いを入れさせてよ
subtitles.english: Let me put these feelings into it.

subtitles.original: ねぇ 好きって言って
subtitles.english: Hey, say that you love me.

subtitles.original: 好きって言って
subtitles.english: Say that you love me.

subtitles.original: 他に何もいらないとかは嫌だ
subtitles.english: I don't want to hear that you don't need anything else.

subtitles.original: 好きって言って
subtitles.english: Say that you love me.

subtitles.original: あわよくば
subtitles.english: And if possible...

subtitles.original: 君自体が欲しいんです
subtitles.english: I want you yourself.

subtitles.original: ぱふぱふにゃーにゃー おーまいごー
subtitles.english: Paffu-paffu nyaa-nyaa, oh my god.

subtitles.original: ぱふぱふにゃーにゃー おーまいごー
subtitles.english: Paffu-paffu nyaa-nyaa, oh my god.

subtitles.original: わー！
subtitles.english: Wow!

subtitles.original: 楽しかったね！
subtitles.english: That was fun!

subtitles.original: 楽しかったね船長！
subtitles.english: That was fun, Marine!

subtitles.original: シオンたん！
subtitles.english: Shion-tan!

subtitles.original: お誕生日おめでとう！
subtitles.english: Happy birthday!

subtitles.original: ありがとう！
subtitles.english: Thank you!

subtitles.original: ねぇ可愛い写真撮ろう？
subtitles.english: Hey, let's take some cute photos.

subtitles.original: え？シオンたん？
subtitles.english: Eh? Shion-tan?

subtitles.original: うー、かわ、うー、たらたら... 何すんの？何すんの？
subtitles.english: Urgh... cute... urgh... rambling... What are you doing? What are you doing?

subtitles.original: じゃあさ船長、猫ちゃんのさ、ポーズしよう、猫ちゃん！
subtitles.english: Then Marine, let's do a cat pose. A cat!

subtitles.original: しよ！せーので行くよ？
subtitles.english: Let's do it! On three, okay?

subtitles.original: せーの！
subtitles.english: One, two!

subtitles.original: ねひょー！
subtitles.english: Meow!

subtitles.original: 船長違う！ちょっと戻って！戻って一回！
subtitles.english: Marine, that's not it! Come back! Come back for a second!

subtitles.original: 違うよ！可愛いポーズでしょ！
subtitles.english: No! It's supposed to be a cute pose!

subtitles.original: 可愛いねー
subtitles.english: How cute.

subtitles.original: じゃあさ、うさぎさんのポーズしよう！うさぎさんね！
subtitles.english: Then, let's do a rabbit pose! A rabbit!

subtitles.original: 行くよ？せーの！
subtitles.english: Ready? One, two!

subtitles.original: ふん！ふん！ふん！
subtitles.english: Hmph! Hmph! Hmph!

subtitles.original: ドカベン！
subtitles.english: Dokaben!

subtitles.original: 船長！船長！ちょっと！どっこいしょ、どっこいしょ...
subtitles.english: Marine! Marine! Wait! Heave-ho, heave-ho...

subtitles.original: 船長、なんか、可愛い声と、なんか所々おばさん出てきてるよ！
subtitles.english: Marine, your cute voice is being mixed with glimpses of an old lady!

subtitles.original: うわーん！おばさんじゃないもん！
subtitles.english: Wah! I'm not an old lady!

subtitles.original: きつい！きついよ！
subtitles.english: This is tough! It's too tough!

subtitles.original: シオンたん、マリンが可愛いから呼んでくれたんだよね？おばさんじゃ、こんなの！
subtitles.english: Shion-tan, you invited me because I'm cute, right? This isn't an old lady!

subtitles.original: ほらマリン、こんなの可愛いって言ってくれたよね？こんなの違うよ！
subtitles.english: Look, Marine, you said I was cute, right? This is all wrong!

subtitles.original: 待って！可愛いって言ってくれたじゃん！ちょっと、ねぇ、メンヘラおばさんじゃん！
subtitles.english: Wait! You said I was cute! Hey, wait, you're being a crazy old lady!

subtitles.original: まさか次のゲストに行く気？マリンを捨てて、可愛いマリンを捨てる気！？
subtitles.english: Are you going to the next guest? Are you going to abandon Marine, the cute Marine!?

subtitles.original: 船長ごめんね、シオン行かなきゃ！
subtitles.english: Sorry Marine, I have to go!

subtitles.original: 船長はさ、可愛いけど、他にも可愛い女がいたんだ！
subtitles.english: Marine, you're cute and all, but I've found another cute girl!

subtitles.original: じゃあねー！
subtitles.english: See ya!

subtitles.original: 白い雪のプリンセスは
subtitles.english: The Snow White Princess is

subtitles.original: 鏡よ鏡よ鏡さん 世界で一番可愛いがるんのは
subtitles.english: Mirror, mirror, mirror... Who is the cutest in the world?

subtitles.original: やめてよ 棘のような視線 刺さる
subtitles.english: Stop it. Those thorny gazes are piercing through me.

subtitles.original: 清楚に振る舞った彼女が 素敵な晩餐もてなした
subtitles.english: She who behaved so purely served a wonderful dinner.

subtitles.original: そっと口に含むぞ 永遠に
subtitles.english: I'll gently take a bite, forever...

subtitles.original: 薄れゆく 意識の中で
subtitles.english: Inside my fading consciousness,

subtitles.original: 夢を見てる いつかの御伽話
subtitles.english: I'm dreaming. A fairytale from long ago.

subtitles.original: 時が止まる
subtitles.english: Time stops.

subtitles.original: お願い キスで目を覚ましてほしいの
subtitles.english: Please, I want you to wake me up with a kiss.

subtitles.original: 白い 棺から 連れ出してよ
subtitles.english: Take me away from this white coffin.
